--- Paul Holser <pholser@...> wrote: 
> my wish list for "TigerUnit":
> 
> -- use native Java assertion mechanism in Assert
>    methods

Given that Java's native assertion mechanism is
optional I'm not sure wether doings so is a good idea.
Also, being able to distinguish native from JUnit
seems
a rather usefull feature to me.

> -- make Assert no longer a superclass of TestCase. 
> to use Assert's 
> methods unqualified, use static import

Definitely. (Extracting a TestFixture superclass from
TestCase could be a client-friendly way to do so)

Kind regards,
Sven
